Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameBuilder

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameBuilder
public class GameBuilder extends Object
Class realizing the Builder pattern. It is used by Controller to build a game with the desired parameters and listeners.

    • startGame

      public GameInterface startGame()
      Creates a Game object using the provided players' nicknames and listeners.
      Returns:
      The Game object created, hidden as a GameInterface, if this has all listeners and the list of players set in a consistent way, else null.
